website_summaries.verdict: This blaster helps keep strain off the back, but it may start slipping if you lift more than 100 lb.
pros: Contoured, thick-gauge aluminum design with padded elbow and neck support
Heavy plastic buckle for clip security
Helps keep strain and stress off the back
cons: May have difficulty supporting weights of 100 lb

customer_reviews.title: A must for any serious athlete!
customer_reviews.text: If you are serious about improving the size of your arm you have to get yourself an arm blaster. It just makes the work more efficient by really isolating the biceps. You’ll feel the difference right away. The Rim Sports Arm Blaster is just excellent, in quality and ergonomics.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: This thing is legit!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband beat me to opening the package before I could and he was curious to how this arm blaster even worked...until he used it; we both found that using the arm blaster helped us focus on range of motion and form. It allowed for us to breathe through sets rather than trying to rush through to the next. Because this product forces you to have better form, you can feel muscles worming that you didn't even know you had. I highly recommend this product for others to use!
customer_reviews.author: Dnrouse

customer_reviews.title: 51 years old and first time using this equipment
customer_reviews.text: I discovered that I like this Arm Blaster apparatus more than I thought I would. This keeps your form strict. And using it on high rep burn outs really had my biceps BURNING. I will cycle this on and off throughout the year. Worth the spend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen James

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates arm swing. Get your swole on people!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quick. Work a great. Perfect addition to my home gym. Quality great. Anyone who works out or beginner will be satisfied. Helps with form no cheating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Easy to size, and does an excellent job for even us small women looking to hop on the gainz train! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ksakievich

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! It totally isolates the muscles. I didn't realize how many other muscles I was using to get the weight up with my curls!This is made we'll and works great!
customer_reviews.author: JessiC

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t seem flimsy or like it was going to bend
customer_reviews.text: So last night I got to use my arm Blaster and i was thoroughly impressed by the quality of it. Didn’t seem flimsy or like it was going to bend. Although i didn’t quite get the fit right ( should be on my triceps as opposed to my elbows) I was still comfortable enough to do my sets. My only con was that the arm pockets aren’t set back a little more you tend to feel your arms are forward more other than that I liked it and I will be incorporating it into my arm night at the gym
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Very well made and durable. You will definitely feel the burn! Purchased this to use with my 10th and 11th grade fitness classes (physical education) to help the students really isolate the muscles and stop swinging from the hips and arms when completing the exercise! Will also use with my more advanced personal training clients to help them get more from their biceps and triceps workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Megan R

customer_reviews.title: Good product, just don't be too big
customer_reviews.text: Product is made well, good quality. Unfortunately, I am too wide for it so I'm not able to use it to it's full ability.
customer_reviews.author: John JMG

customer_reviews.title: Corrects bad form, and your ego.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for isolating your biceps. All to often you let your ego lift at the gym and not your actual arms. You, and you see others, swinging up weights that they can not actually stagnant lift. This eliminates that swing and forces you to use just your meat hooks. I was curling 60's ugly, and after 3 weeks with the Blaster, I am up to 50's with great form. I recommend this product to anyone who wants to get more serious at the gym, and/or have hit a plateau with their current arm training.
customer_reviews.author: KnightRider

customer_reviews.title: This was a perfect tool for him use
customer_reviews.text: Got the Arm Blaster today!! My nephew was premature and born with hydrocephalus and was told because he was disabled due to his club feet and deformed digits on his hands and was told he would not be able to do things a normal kid would be able to do. This proved the doctors wrong. This was a perfect tool for him use. Thank you RIMSports
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Brand !!
customer_reviews.text: Great products with more color options than any other brand I’ve seen! Arm blaster works as one would expect . Top notch customer service !!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: If your wide it won't work
customer_reviews.text: Was looking forward to this item.. I'm definitely to wide for it total waste of cash
customer_reviews.author: joshua s.

customer_reviews.title: Creates awkward lifting
customer_reviews.text: I might be in the minority with this, but this product actually negatively impacted my form and has caused slight forearm pain. Utilizing this product for bicep curls, the lifter needs to keep there elbows in and locked in position, same with shoulders, and back straight. This product unfortunately forces the lifter's arms in a stressed position when at rest. I remember these items working better in my youth, but I simply had better form WITHOUT it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: So uncomfortable and cheap straps cut through skin.
customer_reviews.text: So uncomfortable threw my bicep workout off. Straps cut through skin and where the curve meets crashes triceps in painful way. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: Kish

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try this out with my gym buddies due to all the positive reviews and was very surprised at how uncomfortable it was to use. It was unusable. And all my friends who tried it came to the same conclusion. I cannot understand the positive reviews
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable! Tried many different positions and it hurt arms/stomach/chest, you name it... it hurt. Would not recommend it to anyone, was hoping for a much better product.
customer_reviews.author: video guy

customer_reviews.title: Must have for every gym
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time and I wish I had one of these a long time ago. It's amazing how much you recruit other muscles while doing curls, this arm blaster seems to eliminate that. Get one!!!
customer_reviews.author: bl

customer_reviews.title: Get bigger arms and save your back.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always found these things to help get me that pump that comes with isolation and contraction. With the arm blaster, the anatomical design allows you to isolate your biceps and save your back. People don’t realize how much they use their back when they swing trying to lift too heavy. The bicep blaster makes you use a weight you can use correctly by forcing your biceps to do all the work.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia McMahan

customer_reviews.title: Great Add to Any Home Gym
customer_reviews.text: Just happened to stumble across this on Amazon and so glad I did. I have been lifting for 20 plus years, however, the last 12 have though my garage home gym, so I don't tend to invest in this type of equipment. I just saw how cheap it was and the reviews were great, so I figured Id give it a try. It is indeed great. Forces way more stress on your bis, to the point that I had to lower the weight some. The main thing I like is it really helps you keep your form so much better and remove to a strong degree the lower back when doing heavy curls. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Scott V

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.text: 1. Let me start by saying, the customer service and cofounder are great. Before my item even arrived I was contacted asking if everything was ok, is there anything they could do for me. 2. It’s a great product, very easy to use, and sturdy. Even when curling 60 lbs it didn’t feel flimsy, or like it would loosen up. My arms felt the burn, great workout item. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This really works!
customer_reviews.text: I will be honest, I was skeptical about this product but I’m a believer now. I noticed a difference in my biceps after the first use. It really helps me use the proper form when doing bicep curls and I couldn’t be happier with the results I am seeing. I’ve had people in my gym ask if they could try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O.

customer_reviews.title: Great Arm Blaster best for price.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very comfortable, extremely durable. Strap is easy to adjust. The neck pad is comfortable The rubber sides are solid and don’t cause any discomfort when used.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Guitrau

customer_reviews.title: Hate it
customer_reviews.text: This was not at all expected. It was NOT sturdy at all. It literally bent the first time it was used. It's extremely uncomfortable - the pads don't help at all. It just jams into the back of your arms. It also doesn't seem to be contoured properly to fit around curves the right way. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Blast those arms!
customer_reviews.text: This is a new tool for me but so far I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Digs Into my Elbows and Arms
customer_reviews.text: This item was a waste of money. I understand the concept, but I can accomplish the same result without the discomfort of having the brace digging into my upper arms or elbow.s I tried to make it work by adjusting the straps to raise and lower the brace, though to no avail. I most strongly recommend that you save your money. The padding, such as it is, is thin and rock hard. Win some, lose some.
customer_reviews.author: James Leach

customer_reviews.title: You’ll need this at the gym
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the boyfriend his review on it is it works don’t hurt & you can go heavy on it which is why he asked me to get it for him. So guy people here you go
customer_reviews.author: Zahra Amiri

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Arm Blaster
customer_reviews.text: Love this 'arm blaster'. I had the original by I think Weider back in the late '70's and this is just as good. Really helps in isolation when doing bar curls and blasts the biceps. BTW, it is not comfortable, but it isn't meant to be. If your 'sensitive' I wouldn't get it. This is a tool to isolate the biceps for hard core bodybuilders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: I used one of these back in the early 80's when they were first introduced. It's an ingenious design that has definitely withstood the test of time. The price is more than reasonable considering the $159.99 price when first introduced back in the 80's. The design allows for the isolation of the biceps and thus prevents any strain to my damaged spine when sitting in a straight back chair during it's use.
customer_reviews.author: Ritchie Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: So far, I am ripping it up :)
customer_reviews.text: So far I have noticed positioning is key when using this. If it sits just right on your solar plexus it almost cuts the wind off so play with the adjustment to get it just right for you. Overall, I like the versatility of not needing a bench/preacher seat for support. Great product with solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy. Made in America.
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made. Being made in America is a plus. I gave it four stars only because it’s a little uncomfortable. It’s the only one I ever used so I don’t know if they are all like that. I’m glad I bought it. Saved me from buying a preacher curl bench for the home bench.
customer_reviews.author: BROLIER

customer_reviews.title: Extremely hard on triceps and abdomen, please read*
customer_reviews.text: ***Please Read*** The blaster is sturdy as hell but is the most uncomfortable piece of gym equipment my hands have ever touched. I’ve been going to the gym for 3 + years using many arm blasters provided by the gyms and decided to get one for myself, this is not the one. The “rubber pads” are just as hard at the metal material it’s made out of. Super rough on the triceps when curling and the ends are not curved properly for a proper curl forcing the metal blaster into ur abdomen. Personally wouldn’t recommend. Returning
customer_reviews.author: Harrison

customer_reviews.title: It works but could be made better
customer_reviews.text: The metal part is good, but everything else is crappy. The adjustment clip gets in the way most of the time, so it'll dig into your tricep and rib. The rubber part (Where the triceps rest) is cut short. its better to just cut the rubber part off so you feel the smooth metal vs the drop off of the rubber on the back of the arm. the foam pad for your neck is useless, mostly just for looks. it'll work for light barbell curls but once you get past 50lbs you will end up with rope marks on the back of your neck. if you're handy just rivet a leather belt to it and it'll last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. It provides my elbow, bicep and forearm tendons the support they need in order to properly conduct each rep. This is really a miracle worker for me. I would highly recommend for anybody with tendon problems in your arms.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Schueller

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well-built, and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I just got this yesterday and used it once. It's exactly what I was looking for. I really want to say that RIMSports has great customer service, because the same day it was delivered, I received an email from RIMSports to verify that I did, in fact, receive my arm blaster and that I was satisfied with it. It's rare to see proactive customer service like that, and I appreciate it. I think it shows that they believe in their product and are willing to do whatever it takes to ensure customer satisfaction. I'd definitely buy something else from them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Holahan, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great bicep isolation
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what i wanted. I’m rehabbing a neck surgery and i felt pressure on the neck from holding a barbell or dumbbells. This takes all the downward pressure exerted on the neck and traps and transfers it to the brace.
customer_reviews.author: Jody R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Do as described. I gave it a 4 star on the comfort only because plastic buckle for the strap adjustment sits uncomfortably on my neck. I could be one of those cases where I have to wear mine at such a short length but I’m around 5’8 true height so maybe you have to give and take. Overall excellent by far!
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I shouldve gotten this sooner. Really isolates the biceps, perfect for arm day and not to mention great customer service. I recommended this to a friend and let him try it and he ordered one for himself!!. Cant go wrong with this. Its very high quality and most importantly it works!!.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah S.

customer_reviews.title: My gym buddy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I am new at body building, getting the correct posture while doing my program is my program. With this, it allows me to do more reps and really protects my shoulders from injury. I do heavy curl bar and dumb bells once or twice a week and I haven't been this sore. This bar is supporting most of the pressure. I hope this is sturdy enough, I've seen some like this having reviews that it break easily. For me still as good as new. Hope I wont have to redo this review just to say it snaps after x times of use.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Stress Done Right
customer_reviews.text: I tend to do standing barbell curls with 3 bars to choose from and it makes curls with all of them feel more natural. This device keeps the stress off my shoulders and entirely on my arms. This device is also great for resistance band pushdowns on a power cage. Sturdieness is questionable as I'm working back up to max effort and have yet to get there on the curling movement. It's overall great for what it does
customer_reviews.author: mattattack731

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews on many of these. A lot of complaints about discomfort or poor quality. So took a chance and picked this one. It's perfect! Look forward to using it every time I workout.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Blast Those Bi's.
customer_reviews.text: Every gym should have one. If yours doesn't, buy one of these. Pretty comfortable, could be a bit wider and sturdier. But no real complaints. Does the job, and does it well.
customer_reviews.author: ElvisMan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Would love a little more comfort around the neck.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the arm blaster. The material where the elbows sit is a really nice surface and does not cause any discomfort to the skin. I was expecting the foam around the neck to be a little more ergonomic and thick/padded cloth kind of a material. It is currently a piece of foam. It still does a great job, but gets a little bit uncomfortable as you get to higher weights/reps. Overall it is a great product and really serves its purpose. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Teja

customer_reviews.title: Correct form and solid product
customer_reviews.text: I am terrible with keeping correct posture during weights. This arm blaster helps me keep correct form and isolate my biceps. At first I thought it would be uncomfortable around my neck and arms but that is not the case. Solid product I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: Biceps heaven.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, Well built. Rubber texture on ends is a nice touch. However, neck pad is small, stiff and not padded enough. Still a worthwhile purchase compared to junk on web. Fix the pad!
customer_reviews.author: oscarr

customer_reviews.title: Arm blaster is uneven
customer_reviews.text: This arm blaster is poorly made. I had just received it, took it out of the box and did a set. I noticed my left tricep was pinching on the arm blaster. After looking at it closer, the left side of the arm blaster had a slight bend inwards. You can see the unevenness in my pics. I’m returning it today.
customer_reviews.author: MJM

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very adjustable and gym quality for an excellent price. Others look and may be very similar but I liked the color selections offered instead of just-plain-black.
customer_reviews.author: nope

customer_reviews.title: Great for isolating the biceps
customer_reviews.text: This product is useful for someone that doesn’t know how to do a proper curl. It also helps isolating the biceps. I find myself not using it often because I broke my arm a long time ago and it puts it in a weird angle that is uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: George Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Quality Design / Fairly Priced
customer_reviews.text: Effective design helps target biceps for maximum gains. Well built to withstand long term use. Compliments any work out routine by adding an extra advantage to building bicep strength and form. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: G. Loiacono

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY PLEASED !!!
customer_reviews.text: This works as advertised. Im pleased with it. Dont be afraid to mold it to your body type. Im a smaller guy (5'9"/145lbs) I had to put the arm blaster on and bend the chest plate to better suit me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Instant challenge, no discomfort, really great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, comfortable (contrary to some other reviews), and I think rather sturdy. Does exactly what it says it will. Instant burn and increased challenge on first use. I look forward to this vastly improving my lift strength.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Well made and comfortable. Plenty of length to find the right adjustment for each individual. Great at isolating the biceps. Don't hesitate to buy if your in the market for this product.
customer_reviews.author: EDC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good size, effective
customer_reviews.text: Happy with it. Simple and effective, sturdy, can be used without the neck strap. I’m 6’1” 205lb and it’s a good fit, was worried it might be too small. Can feel the difference in the pump after the first workout with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan James

customer_reviews.title: It really works! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is just amazing! It helps make sure you keep the correct form and do not end up hurting your arms. My fiance who is a firefighter also uses this and took it to the station with him. Seems like everyone likes it! Adjusting it is super easy!
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY L SIDEBOTHAM

customer_reviews.title: Great Device for Triceps as Well
customer_reviews.text: While most discussion about this Arm Blaster is focused on bicep development, it is extremely helpful for triceps development as well. As I'd raised resistance doing tricep pushdowns over the years without this device, I tended to overwork/strain my elbow joints. This device does a great job of unloading your elbows and concentrating on the triceps. No elbow soreness since I started using this.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL V.

customer_reviews.title: It just works
customer_reviews.text: Im limited to a pair of 25lb and a pair of 40lb dumbells while in quarantine, and this device has transformed my workout. I normally could throw those 40's around, but this arm blaster has clearly illustrated that my form was off. Im back to the 25s working on form, and cant wait until i can get the 40's up. I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality of this product. It stays in place when curling and helps to avoid the back swing we tend to do with heavy weight. We stay true to the weight we can actually curl because all the focus is on the biceps. The padding for the neck stays in place but I wish it was a bit thicker. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: BV

customer_reviews.title: Slight uncomfort
customer_reviews.text: I used it over the weekend, it work out pretty well for the most part but the pads were slighty a little uncomfortable. But other than that i did my reps and sets with it for the most of it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for isolating your bicep curls
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with this arm blaster because it helped to isolate your movements while during your curls. It also helps to prevent back injury because you're not jerking your back while doing your bicep curls because it helps to stabilize you. It is easily adjustable, which I love, since I'm a short girl. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, but the neck strap is a little uncomfortable depending on the weight I’m using.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Benavides

customer_reviews.title: Maybe works Ok with what is a light weight for a lifter
customer_reviews.text: Updating my original review to 3 stars a year later: I found it's easier to use if you have it only over one shoulder. This way it's way, way easier on your neck. Agreeing with another reviewer. This product actually forces the lifter's back and shoulders in a stressed position when at rest. Only good if I work with what is a light weight for me. Curling heavy weights forcer my shoulders and back to move in a very awkward and hurtful way
customer_reviews.author: Farida Badalova

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC! Really isolated muscles to be worked and keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC! Really isolated muscles to be worked and keeps strain and stress (ie injuries) away from the back. Great concept. So simple, but so effective!
customer_reviews.author: tablet AT

customer_reviews.title: Way to short
customer_reviews.text: These are meant for small people. If you work out and are fit you prob have a wider upper body. This will not work. Form is everything. Cant use this.
customer_reviews.author: Surfinggstud

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction.
customer_reviews.text: The Arm Blaster is made very well and will last. Unfortunately, I found it was not for me, but incredible customer service worthy of 5 stars overall
customer_reviews.author: scaryd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Isolates/controls form very well for bicep curls. Effective, well priced. No issues with this thing at all. Grew up using them, but my gym doesn't have them so I got this. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Magnanti

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: During this pandemic I’ve been searching for ways to isolate areas during a workout . This has been a real winner for me. Corrected a lot of my form and isolated my biceps and seem to be really showing results . I can feel and see a difference
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Witkowski

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, does the job well!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this. He said everyone at the gym was using it and will now be ordering one for themselves
customer_reviews.author: Mom to 2 Boys

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Overall very well made. Have had no issues thus far and it is sturdy. Definitely have no complaints and definitely does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Jfrick

customer_reviews.title: Biceps = blasted
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been lifting for 6 years, and I wish I had the bicep blaster years before. The blaster works to isolate just your bicep, basically a preacher curl. Without swinging your knees, back or whatever it helps get the workout of the biceps perfectly adjusted to just the biceps, without using and other parts of your body.
customer_reviews.author: Craig H

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. Have used it with an 80 lb bar and isolates the bicep perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Brad Vestal

customer_reviews.title: Definitly works!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it was designed for. Gives biceps a great pump! would have given 5 stars except its a little uncomfortable. could use a little more padding next to the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good item for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really great product, I was a little skeptical at first because I seen a lot of reviews saying it hurts your triceps, but I love this product it’s strong and adjustable so you can slide it up or down for your comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good , sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Good item, sturdy and well made , I only have a little claim , the lock for strap adjustment, is plastic. I don't know is this will be durable. But I am good with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: RAO

customer_reviews.title: I leave the arm blaster in the gym where I workout and everyone that uses it really does enjoy it. That's why it is getting a 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: I have very wide shoulders/lats so my elbows fit very "snug". I leave the arm blaster in the gym where I workout and everyone that uses it really does enjoy it. That's why it is getting a 5 star from me. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works great, isolates the biceps and helps keep your back straight when lifting. Four stars instead of five because the padding on the neck could be thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really hits biceps!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great old school training tool. It definitely hits the lower biceps. But Ive been training for many years. Im not sure if this blaster is good for someone just starting to lift. I think you need some size first. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe T.

customer_reviews.title: Blasts arms
customer_reviews.text: Proper form for biceps and triceps. Great addition to my workout
customer_reviews.author: Honest Review

customer_reviews.title: Isolate the biceps
customer_reviews.text: I love this invention; it is a must if you work out at home to isolate the biceps.
customer_reviews.author: MOE

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy, coated nicely
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy, coated nicely, adjusting is super easy. This equipment doesn't feel awkward to use! If your looking for a great price with great quality this is the item you need to try!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Harris

customer_reviews.title: its  a great product
customer_reviews.text: hey this is great . i have not figured out the triceps work out yet
customer_reviews.author: Tarrell

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Just wish the pad was a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Pump, Pump, Pump it up!
customer_reviews.text: My husband could not keep his arms straight to save his life so this product makes our workout so much more effective. We love it, and its great quality, easy and quick to adjust the length. Its aso very easy to take along. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey yazzie

customer_reviews.title: Hits the core of the biceps for better results
customer_reviews.text: I love it use to train with it in those old school gyms but they don't provide those at the newer gyms like LA Fitness or 24 hour gyms.its like doing preacher curls standing up and it keeps you doing curls in proper form everyone cheats when they get to tight or tired and your form gets a little sloppy
customer_reviews.author: Liumarrodriguez

customer_reviews.title: good but wish it was more comfortable
customer_reviews.text: good but I feel like it could be more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Wow, and I mean wow. This was a solid piece and so happy with this purchase. When I do accessories I use this now and the PUMP IS REAL!
customer_reviews.author: David  MoralesTop Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: Bigger arms
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Tried doing my usual weight with this thing on and it made a huge difference. My arms feel the pump and i can see noticeable change in strength and size of my biceps.
customer_reviews.author: phil Morton

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product to maintain form and isolate! Love the feeling of being able to isolate your bicep curl without the preacher bench
customer_reviews.author: Lila

customer_reviews.title: Makes the husband happy
customer_reviews.text: Husband likes it so yeah. He is constantly getting asked where he got it when he used it at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the boyfriend, he says he can really feel the difference since using this bar, and I can see the difference. He says it feels comfortable but sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great support & helps with form plus nothing in lower back.

customer_reviews.title: I am 6.6" 320 pounds in is too small up under my arms but I like the  Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product I like you a lot if it was Larger I would give it all 5 stars

customer_reviews.title: Good Investment
customer_reviews.text: Works great for forcing most if not all resistance onto the biceps!

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot it make work only the biceps, the product itself is made very good quality, and the price is the lowest on the market, I highly recommend this product 110%
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Details
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be pretty sturdy,which is good. The strap is comfortable but I feel the metal is not bowed enough. With my elbows Locked in I feel my arms are to far forward. One reason I am hesitant to buy stuff online ...however my local sports stores didn’t stock any.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya wilson

customer_reviews.title: Ok value.
customer_reviews.text: Neck pad is a little thin. But if you are a smaller framed person, not bad for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Crista A.

customer_reviews.title: Light and super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This arm blaster is super lightweight and very sturdy, this company has surpassed my expectations of good quality gym equipment I really like the adjustable strap and the fact that it doesn’t bother my boobs lol
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Clements

customer_reviews.title: Arms are getting massive!
customer_reviews.text: Been doing these arm blasters switching it up throwing my body off but definitely seeing results in my arms great product!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Bigger Arms Incoming!
customer_reviews.text: Best arm workout ever with this thing! Isolates your bicep workouts and you can really feel the pump!
customer_reviews.author: lolo loredo

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This equipment is the truth! If you think your doing good bicep curls without it, just wait until you use the arm blaster. It will surely cut them biceps 💪🏾 up!

customer_reviews.title: Muscle growth
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to get use to, but it really helps with muscle isolation for better hypertrophy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Huggins

product_meta.title: RIMSports Arm Blaster for Biceps and Triceps Arm Blaster for Weight Lifting Bicep Blaster and Bicep Curl Support for Bodybuilding & Weight Lifting Bicep Isolator and Arm Blaster for Biceps
feature_bullets: Posture Support Technology: Our Arm Blaster for biceps is the ideal tool for weight lifting and body building. The blaster body supports your elbows, enabling you to keep correct posture during curls and triceps exercises. When curling your biceps curl bar, users immediately notice proper bicep isolation. Our Arm Blaster muscle bomber will enhance biceps curls and allow you to build lean, big muscle. This is the biceps isolator and black color arm blaster for novice and serious trainers

Heavy Duty Construction: Our muscle arm blaster has a heavy plastic buckle for clip for security. The muscle bomber can fit any sized body and is made of thick gauge aluminum and has padded support in the elbow and neck for comfort and stability. This biceps bomber has an adjustable Velcro strap made of webbed nylon, while the neck pad is made of neoprene. Our padded, dense elbow pads, mimics a curl barbell pad. This reduces unwanted momentum when performing dumbbell curls and barbell curls

Performance Enhancing Design: Our Biceps Isolator Arm Blaster is used to enhance bicep curls, acting as an arm lift belt as it helps users build muscle. There is a Heavy Metal Buckle for Clip that goes with the bicep blaster aluminum build, which keeps the belt secure and fits any sized body. This biceps curl bar, comes as a biceps belt, neck strap and foam padding. Made from high-grade aluminum, this big arms blaster is designed to be worn around the neck when performing biceps curls

Strength Building Advantage: Our Arm Blaster is the big arms blaster for serious weight lifting. This bicep isolator imitates the preacher curl with its preacher curl strap. This piece of exercise equipment is also portable. Our biceps isolator arm blaster eliminates discomfort that other arm blasters cause with its addition of neck strap padding. The Arm Blaster promotes proper form while isolating the biceps maximizing the strength building benefits of the workout

LIFETIME GUARANTEE AND WARRANTY: We at RIMSports focus on quality, comfort, safety and customer satisfaction in our products . Our products are handmade and designed in USA. If for any reason you're not satisfied, email us and we’ll take care of you! We guarantee our products with full refund or replacement guarantee and We are happy to thank you for making us successful quality focused brand with a New York attitude
